intro: Brucea sumatrana, commonly known as the Sumatran Brucea, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers and elliptical, dark green leaves. Brucea sumatrana is often found in tropical forests and is adapted to grow in moist, shaded environments. It is also known for its medicinal properties, with various parts of the plant used in traditional medicine.
